pr_title: Fixes #947: TupleKeyCountTree.addPrefixChild only ever adds one child

replies.bodyText: Yes. I also renamed the formal parameters to not conflict with the field to cut down on such confusion.
replies.author: MMcM

timeline.message: Don't use field name as parameter name
